## Source: amazon-inspector (ffcf244ee511453d176367146c8b6b5ee74d18e3037210dd63d19712c8647991)
The package intl-tel-input-utils was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d96393cae9fde7e5be7088e212e95db7517adadbbf664f343f275f9bf85b04f2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'intl-tel-input-utils' @ 99.99.100 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
